column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were seated comfortably near the front of the restaurant and bar.  The three of us shared a medium deep dish
column2: with pepperoni and jalapeño.  I think deep dish needs a sausage with some dimension to fill it out
column3: so maybe we will try that next time.  We also had a salad
column5: it didn't seem like Lou cared much for his salad.  It was out of a bag
column6: with barely any dressing on it. Is it serviceable as a side? Barely.  We downed all this with a pitcher a Revolution Anti-Hero IPA.
